subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Need common abbreviation list
msgSnippet: ... I went ahead and added the standard words to my list. I could make most of them out. The only one I had trouble with is always. The manual seems to spell
messageBody:
Paul Tremblay wrote:

>
> Thanks! I've included these words in a new dictionary and the news
> should now have these abbreviations. Is there any way you could include
> the words that are supposedly already in the CMU? In fact, some of these
> words are in my personal dictionary. Both this dictionary, and the CMU,
> will undergo change, so I would like to have a separate file that I can
> rely on for the standard QS abbreviations and other standard words.
>

I went ahead and added the standard words to my list. I could make most
of them out. The only one I had trouble with is "always." The manual
seems to spell it without a final "Ado," but you have a final
"Ado"--which is it?

Paul
